#summary Installation Instructions.

= Installation =

You can install your plugin in one of two ways. 

== Plugin Installer ==
  # After you have downloaded your file, log into your WordPress Admin Section.
  # Go to Plugins-> Add New.
  # Go to the Upload Link.
  # Navigate to your file.
  # Click on the Upload Button.
  # After it is has installed, click on the Activation Link.

== Manual ==
  # Upload cool-ryan-easy-popups plugin folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory.
  # Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress.
